title: the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister justice home affair migration) order 2025

title: the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Adrian O’Higgins, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Adrian O’Higgins, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and 
Migration, with effect from 10 February 2025.
text_norm: 2 adrian higgins particular whose address deposited office department justice home affair migration appointed special adviser minister justice home affair migration effect 10 february 2025

title: the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 3. Suzanne Coogan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Suzanne Coogan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration, 
with effect from 24 March 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

24 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [400] 3
